mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, FEE_TOTAL_AMOUNT, VALUE_DATE, CLOSING_DATE, ADDUP_OVERDUE_DAY, ADDUP_OVERDUE_AMOUNT, APPLY_STATUS, REPAY_STATUS, SETTLE_DATE, SETTLE_MODE, APPLY_COMMENT, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, PROC_INST_ID
mapper.insert: insert into t_other_fee (ID, APP_ID, FEE_TOTAL_AMOUNT, VALUE_DATE, CLOSING_DATE, ADDUP_OVERDUE_DAY, ADDUP_OVERDUE_AMOUNT, APPLY_STATUS, REPAY_STATUS, SETTLE_DATE, SETTLE_MODE, APPLY_COMMENT, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, PROC_INST_ID ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeTotalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{valueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{closingDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{addupOverdueDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addupOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{settleMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update t_other_fee
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{feeTotalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
VALUE_DATE = #{valueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CLOSING_DATE = #{closingDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ADDUP_OVERDUE_DAY = #{addupOverdueDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADDUP_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{addupOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPAY_STATUS = #{repayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_DATE = #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE},
SETTLE_MODE = #{settleMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_COMMENT = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_other_fee set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{feeTotalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, VALUE_DATE = #{valueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CLOSING_DATE = #{closingDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ADDUP_OVERDUE_DAY = #{addupOverdueDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADDUP_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{addupOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAY_STATUS = #{repayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLE_DATE = #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, SETTLE_MODE = #{settleMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_COMMENT = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.ITEM_NAME as itemName, c.DICT_DATA_NAME as itemNameDesc, b.ITEM_AMOUNT as itemAmount from T_OTHER_FEE a left join T_OTHER_FEE_DETAIL b on a.id = b.OTHERFEE_APPLY_ID left join SYS_DICT_DATA c on c.DICT_DATA_CODE = b.ITEM_NAME where a.ID = #{otherFeeId}

select a.ID as id, a.APP_ID as appId, d.CONTRACT_NO as contractNo, b.NAME as custName, b.ID_NO as idNo, a.FEE_TOTAL_AMOUNT as feeTotalAmount, a.CREATE_DATE as applyDate, e.DICT_DATA_NAME as applyStatus, a.APPLY_COMMENT as applyComment, c.NAME_ as taskName, f.ACCOUNT_NAME as assignee, a.PROC_INST_ID as procInstId, g.PROC_DEF_ID_ as procDefId from T_OTHER_FEE a left join T_APPLY_TENANT b on a.APP_ID = b.APP_ID left join ACT_RU_TASK c on a.PROC_INST_ID = c.PROC_INST_ID_ left join T_SIGN_CONTRACT d on a.APP_ID = d.APP_ID left join SYS_DICT_DATA e on a.APPLY_STATUS = e.DICT_DATA_CODE left join SYS_ACCOUNT f on c.ASSIGNEE_ = f.ACCOUNT_ID left join ACT_HI_PROCINST g on a.PROC_INST_ID = g.PROC_INST_ID_ where a.CREATE_ID = #{createId}
